libraries.name: Boston Public Library
libraries.notes: Main branch at Copley Square; items available at various branches

items.name: Oral History Backpack
items.description: Recording equipment for collecting oral histories. Available at Central, Brighton, Codman Sq., Connolly, East Boston, Faneuil, Lower Mills, Roslindale, or Shaw-Roxbury branches. $100 replacement cost.

items.name: Telescope Bag Kit
items.description: Orion StarBlast 4.5 Astro Reflector Telescope with accessories. $350 replacement cost.

items.name: Bird Watching Kit
items.description: Binoculars and field guides for bird watching. Available at Adams St., Brighton, Connolly, East Boston, Egleston Square, Grove Hall, or South Boston branches. $100 replacement cost.

items.name: Kill A Watt Electricity Monitor
items.description: Power meter that measures electrical consumption of small to medium electrical devices in your home. $50 replacement cost.

items.name: Ukulele
items.description: Beginner ukulele for musical skill development. Available at Adams Street and Honan-Allston branches. $50 replacement cost.

items.name: Smarter by Pfaff 140s Sewing Machine
items.description: Sewing machine for DIY projects. $250 replacement cost.

metadata.notes: Boston Public Library has Library of Things items at various branches. Items cannot be returned to book drop; no renewals.
